definition: to go/to take/sentence-final interrogative particle/variant of 於|于[yu2]

sentences.english: They are also more enjoyable places to live.
sentences.chinese: 它们还会成为更宜于居住的地方。

sentences.english: In this paper we advanced that MSK modulation technique is suitable to use in broadband networks.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出在宽带网中宜于采用MSK调制技术。

sentences.english: This kind of soil is good for growing watermelons.
sentences.chinese: 这种土壤宜于种植天麻。

sentences.english: Keemun Black Tea can be drunk alone or with milk or sugar.
sentences.chinese: 祁红茶最宜于清饮，但也适于加奶加糖调和饮用。

sentences.english: Cotton is nice for the clothes that go next to the skin because it is soft and absorbent.
sentences.chinese: 棉花极宜于做贴身衣服，因为它柔软而又吸水。

sentences.english: The characters of series process are suitable for the confluence desilication.
sentences.chinese: 串联法的工艺特点，更宜于采用合流脱硅。

sentences.english: If it is fine tomorrow, we ought to go out.
sentences.chinese: 假如明天天气好，我门宜于出门。

sentences.english: This kind of operation works best in brackish water .
sentences.chinese: 这种生产方法最宜于微咸水。

definition: timely/at the right moment/appropriate to the occasion/opportune/to fit current fashion
to be adept in/to excel at
to be jealous of/fear/dread/scruple/to avoid or abstain from/to quit/to give up sth
